description: Trueberry by Elemental Seeds is a Kush-forward cross of True OG and Strawberry Banana x Blackberry. It emits the scent of fresh jam and a pine forest entangled in blackberry brambles. This strain has a strong buzz that thumps the consumer between the eyes with clean, uplifting euphoria. Over time, Trueberry’s heavy physical buzz compounds, soothing minor aches and pains while deflating stress. This plant is slow to develop, but eager to yield over its 60-day flowering cycle.
descriptionPlain: Trueberry by Elemental Seeds is a Kush-forward cross of True OG and Strawberry Banana x Blackberry. It emits the scent of fresh jam and a pine forest entangled in blackberry brambles. This strain has a strong buzz that thumps the consumer between the eyes with clean, uplifting euphoria. Over time, Trueberry’s heavy physical buzz compounds, soothing minor aches and pains while deflating stress. This plant is slow to develop, but eager to yield over its 60-day flowering cycle.

highlightedReviews.text: This strain is legit! I felt a burst of energy within the first couple of pulls for a euphoric high as well as aroused. Def have your munchies ready for this one you'll have an increased appetite. Very smooth, relaxing, sedative come down. One of the best strains I have smoked 👌🏾

The only strain so far that compelled me to write this review. As someone with Crohn's, a dab of this in the morning really evens up my gut. Has just the right amount of sativa, gives you a nice light buzz

name: Trueberry
